titles: A proclamation for discovering who robbed the packquit
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,
notes: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the fifteenth day of August, and of our reign the fourth year, 1692.
Steele notation: Arms 245  Defen- Contempt be.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2359 cropped; lacking imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: Brigands and robbers --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
